    V    		 Interpolator.interpolate​(double time, double duration, int previousIndex, List<T> dataPoints, Looper looper)  
    Color Interpolator.interpolateColor​(double time, double loopDuration, int previousIndex, List<ColorTimePoint> dataPoints, Looper looper, ColorMode transitionMode)
    Colors can interpolate in special ways.
    It is recommended that you call this method instead of interpolate() to interpolate between values.

  • Uses of Looper in org.vanted.animation.loopers

    Subclasses of Looper in org.vanted.animation.loopers
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ForwardLooper
    Similar to a StandardLooper but allows interpolators to interpolate from the end of the animation to the start of the animation.
    class  StandardLooper  
    class  SwingLooper
    Reverses the animation after it goes forward.
